Ingredients.2: 1 (8 ounce) package cream cheese (such as Philadelphia®), softened

Ingredients.6: 2 tablespoons finely chopped Hatch green chile peppers (Optional)

Ingredients.7: 3  hot yellow chile peppers, finely chopped (Optional)

Ingredients.9: 1 teaspoon garlic powder, or more to taste

Ingredients.10: 5 drops hot pepper sauce (such as Tabasco®)

Directions.1: Pit and spoon avocados into a small bowl and add cream cheese. Mash together until well blended.

Directions.2: Add tomatoes and peppers to the mixture and mix well. Mix in lime juice, garlic powder, hot sauce, and salt. Chill for at least 20 minutes before serving.
